thread.title: College football: ONU rallies, stuns No. 11 John Carroll
thread.title_full: College football: ONU rallies, stuns No. 11 John Carroll

author: The Courier
title: College football: ONU rallies, stuns No. 11 John Carroll
text:
Comment: 0 
UNIVERSITY HEIGHTS — Ohio Northern rallied with 17 unanswered points to top unbeaten and No. 11-ranked John Carroll 30-27 in an Ohio Athletic Conference football game on Saturday. Justin Magazine rushed for 99 yards and three total touchdowns to lead the Polar Bears (3-1, 2-1 OAC). Will Freed, despite four turnovers, led ONU’s aerial attack, passing for 321 yards and two touchdowns, including the go-ahead 35-yard TD to Justin McCray with 4:22 remaining. Ohio Northern 0 7 13 10 — 30 John Carroll 10 7 10 0 — 27 First Quarter JC — Howell 25 pass from Schaefer (Vivonetto kick) JC — Vivonetto 31 FG JC — James 5 pass from Schaefer (Vivonetto kick) ONU — Magazine 69 pass from Freed (DiMario kick) Third Quarter JC — McKendick 35 INT return (Vivonetto kick) ONU — Magazine 1 run (kick failed) JC — Vivonetto 39 FG ONU — Magazine 3 run (DiMario kick) Fourth Quarter ONU — McCray 35 pass from Freed (Chaney kick) BLUFFTON 56 HANOVER 10 HANOVER — Conner Sheehan tossed five touchdown passes and Devante Thomas-Wright ran for another three as Bluffton shellacked Hanover 56-10 in a Heartland Collegiate Athletic Conference game on Saturday. Sheehan finished with 198 yards on 13 of 22 passing, while Thomas-Wright totaled 96 yards on 14 carries. Micah Roberson was Sheehan’s favorite target, reeling in 11 passes for 132 yards and two TDs. Korbin Showalter also had two TD receptions for the Beavers. Dustin Fisher led Bluffton with 105 yards on 12 carries as the Beavers improved to 2-2 overall, 1-1 in HCAC. Bluffton 21 21 14 0 — 56 Hanover 7 3 0 0 — 10 First Quarter BLU — Roberson 11 pass from Sheehan (Watkins kick) HAN — Windell 65 pass from Donan (Wheeler kick) BLU — Showalter 28 pass from Sheehan (Watkins kick) BLU — Thomas-Wright 1 run (Watkins kick) Second Quarter BLU — Aelker 5 pass from Sheehan (Watkins kick) HAN — Wheeler 39 FG BLU — Roberson 13 pass from Sheehan (Watkins kick) BLU — Thomas-Wright 5 run (Watkins kick) Third Quarter BLU — Thomas-Wright 25 run (Watkins kick) BLU — Showalter 33 pass from Sheehan (Watkins kick)
